healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
healing_potion.description: A potion containing green liquid. Most likely a healing potion.

poison_vial.name: Poison Vial
poison_vial.description: A potion containing a bright green liquid. Maybe it's a healing potion?

fireball_scroll.name: Fireball Scroll
fireball_scroll.targeting_message: Left-click a target area for the fireball, or right-click to cancel.
fireball_scroll.description: A scroll of ancient glyphs written in red, you can see that the words twist outwards in forming a ball.

lightning_scroll.name: Lightning Scroll
lightning_scroll.description: A faint aura emits from the ancient glyphs written down in this scroll.

confusion_scroll.name: Confusion Scroll
confusion_scroll.targeting_message: Left-click an enemy to confuse it, press ESC to cancel.
confusion_scroll.description: The glowing glyphs in this bright scroll change when you're not looking at it.

teleport_crystal.name: Teleport Crystal
teleport_crystal.targeting_message: Left-click an open spot to teleport there, or press ESC to cancel.
teleport_crystal.description: A lightly-flamed crystal. You glean a familiar location from its reflection.

blind_powder.name: Blind Powder
blind_powder.targeting_message: Left-click an enemy to blind it, or press ESC to cancel.
blind_powder.description: Looks to contain a powder of some sort. It hurts your eyes even looking at it!

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A weak but quick, solution to any hand-to-hand combat.

bread.name: Bread
bread.description: Bread that has aged a few days but not enough to crack your teeth.

document.name: Ledger Page
document.description: Barely legible document containing information about this prison level, including prisoners, guard schedules and stocked supplies.

map.name: Dungeon Map
map.description: Useful to gaining your bearings around this area.

leather_brigandine.name: Leather Brigandine
leather_brigandine.description: Standard guard body armor, lightweight and maneuverable, while offering rudimentary protection around the chest and stomach.

leather_headgear.name: Leather Headgear
leather_headgear.description: The most basic of head protection. Covers the head and as slotted frontwards for sight.

leather_greaves.name: Leather Greaves
leather_greaves.description: Full leather coverage on the legs while still able to maneuver on the battlefield or indoors.

leather_tasset.name: Leather Tasset
leather_tasset.description: Slight leather coverage on the waist and thigh. Nothing much for the rest of the legs however.

leather_gloves.name: Leather Gloves
leather_gloves.description: Basic protection while still increasing swinging dexterity.

leather_boots.name: Leather Boots
leather_boots.description:
A pair of leather boots.
The padded traction help footwork even on slippery surfaces, otherwise clunky.

imperial_chainmail_hauberk.name: Imperial Chainmail Hauberk
imperial_chainmail_hauberk.description: Imperial-grade chain mail armor. Can allow wearer to withstand strong blows while operating around the battlefield.

imperial_chainmail_coif.name: Imperial Chainmail Coif
imperial_chainmail_coif.description: Imperial-grade chain mail armor. Just by pure intimidation alone, anyone wearing this is a force to be reckoned with.

imperial_chainmail_leggings.name: Imperial Chainmail Leggings
imperial_chainmail_leggings.description: Imperial-grade chain mail leggings. Strong enough to withstand any attempt to the legs. Best to try elsewhere.

imperial_longsword.name: Imperial Longsword
imperial_longsword.description: An imperial-forged long sword. From the sharpness of the point, to the complex hilt. Should you face a wielder of this blade, prepare for an arduous fight.

imperial_battle_shield.name: Imperial Battle Shield
imperial_battle_shield.description: Tales of this shield ranges from holding many a war-front to withstanding golems. This imperial-grade shield makes a solid companion,

jail_key.name: Jail Key
jail_key.description: Can be used to free prisoners. At your own peril!

master_key.name: Master Key
master_key.description: Can open any door. Unlimited amount of uses.

wooden_cudgel.name: Wooden Cudgel
wooden_cudgel.description: A short, rough policing tool. Can stun enemies.
